description: Creates a datatable from JSON text.

input.name: json
input.description: A text containing a JSON document.

input.name: columns
input.description:
The columns to be selected from those generated from the JSON object keys and used in the resulting datatable.

By default all columns will be used.

input.name: path
input.description:
A path in the JSON file that will return a array of objects with identical keys that will become the columns in the resulting datatable. The object values will be the values that populate the rows of the datatable.

For an example of a path and an acceptable array see this [snippet](https://gitlab.com/cgps/data-flo/data-flo-io/-/snippets/2249958).

output.name: data
output.description: An object containing columns and rows.
